title: PDF viewer not displaying/displaying artifacts
content: When I open a locally downloaded pdf in firefox, the background is displayed as what was previously displayed on that portion of the screen, and scrolling simply overlays moved text over what was previously displayed. Does not appear in screenshots. One of the images shows what the pdf looks like prior to scrolling, and one after.
creator: alanyu08

title: WHAT is with the LACK OF UPDATE options making this browser WORSE THAN OTHERS it is ridiculous
content: Ridiculous with the new update page saying " A browser that's truly yours My Firefox: More Speed, More Security, More Fun." WHEN YOU CANNOT TURN OFF THE IDIOTIC popup spam for the updates NOT EVEN GOOGLE CHROME DOES THAT. And ridiculous it has to LOAD THE UPDATE after restarting the browser lag time and IDIOTIC BRIGHT SCREEN FLASHING even if you have darkmode on, JESUS CHRIST this browser seems ridiculous and FAR WORSE THAN THE OTHERS WHEN EVEN CHROME IS BETTER with these settings and not being pointlessly ridiculous rofl. WHAT is going on with that people. AND SETTINGS TO FIX THAT would make this less ridiculous to use obviously, THANK
creator: colombioman

title: Grammarly add-on problem
content: I added Grammarly add-on but it doesn't appear on the browser toolbar and in the text fields during edit. How can I troubleshoot and fix it?
creator: vitakononov

title: aba travando
content: Nos últimos dias tem aparecido uma mensagem dizendo "sua aba travou" quando tento carregar uma página no Firefox. gostaria que me ajudassem a resolver esse problema.

title: Synch my laptop and desktop
content: I want to sych the two together with all the info on my Firefox page. Can anyone tell me how to do that? Thanks,

title: After update 126 "open previous windows and tabs" no longer works
content: After update 126 "open previous windows and tabs" no longer works. It is checked but open tabs are not reopened when firefox is restarted. Using macOS Ventura 13.6.7
creator: jamesjohnsonjr
